participant_1.background:
I pray to God for my family every morning and I eat well, but I have never been married.
i have not been on a date since high school.
My life is filled with contradictions, and I'm working on accepting myself for who I am.
I love fresh vegetables and fruit, especially when I can pick them myself.
I remember getting lost in a library for hours as a child.

participant_2.background:
I'm a writer, looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
I collect memories of my best friend from out of town.
I enjoy eating hummus and pita bread, but I am not very close to my family.
My parents are my heroes.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a writer, I'm looking for a job to support myself while I work on my own stories. How are you?
Hello, I'm doing well! I love going to the library and getting lost in books. What do you enjoy reading?
I enjoy reading a variety of things, from nonfiction to fiction. I recently read a book about the history of the library and I found it fascinating. What is your favorite genre?
I love reading fiction, especially fantasy novels. I'm currently reading a book about a young girl who discovers she has magical powers. What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is To Kill a Mockingbird. I read it in high school and it has stuck with me ever since. I love the way Harper Lee explores the themes of racism and prejudice.
I've heard good things about that book, I'll have to check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to recommend books.
I'm also a writer, I'm working on my first novel. It's a fantasy novel about a young girl who discovers she has magical powers.
That sounds really interesting! I would love to read it when you're finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
